data.persona: I am the chambermaid of the king's fortress. I make sure that everyone is pleased. I sometimes get to have free time to myself at the end of the day.
data.description:
You are in the King's chambers.
The room is lavish and extraordinary. Gold and silver line the room. The decor is fantastic and rubies and sapphires can be spotted.
There's a bed, a sapphire, some rubies, some gold, a table, some silver, and a chair here.
A lady in waiting is here.

You are carrying a family heirloom, and wearing an apron.

data.short_motivation: i need a bed of my own
data.mid_motivation: i have to clean the bedrooms
data.long_motivation: i am preparing them for the expected visitors and need to make them clean enough
